attributes.action: Reduce Childcare Fees to help encourage parents to work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems very hard for parents in this country to return to work. Childcare is hard to find and source and then fees are extortionate in relation to salaries.

In some other countries childcare is charged at £3.50 per day where as in this country it can be as much as £1000 per month! 

We would like the Prime Minister to reduce the running costs of childcare providers and help pay salaries of staff. 

There are too many people in this country that simply cannot afford to return to work so have to take the route of being unemployed and claiming benefits - we want this changed. 

Lower childcare costs WILL equal lower unemployment and fewer excuses!
